name: CSSearchQuery
desc: The criteria to apply when searching previously indexed app content.

items.name: let CSSearchQueryString: String
items.desc: Provides the key within the NSUserActivity object’s userInfo dictionary for which the value is the string that represents the user’s current query.

items.name: let CSQueryContinuationActionType: String
items.desc: Indicates that the activity type to continue is a search or query.

items.name: init(queryString: String, attributes: [String]?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a query object with the specified query string and item attributes.

items.name: var protectionClasses: [FileProtectionType]
items.desc: An array of data protection classes that correspond to the protection classes associated with the indexed items.

items.name: func start()
items.desc: Asynchronously queries the index for items that match the query object’s specifications.

items.name: var isCancelled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the query has been cancelled.

items.name: var completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The block to execute when the query completes.

items.name: var foundItemCount: Int
items.desc: The number of items found so far.

items.name: var foundItemsHandler: (([CSSearchableItem]) -> Void)?
items.desc: The block to execute when the query finds a new batch of matching items.
